lst.name: sentence
lst.str: IBM said its Personal System/2 incorporates enhanced integrated graphics functions including significantly improved text, expanded colors up to 256 out of a palette of more than 256,000, and sharper business graphics.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: IBM said Operating System/2 will for the first time give IBM PC users the ability to access multiple applications and very large programs and amounts of data.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The new computers, which mark the first major overhaul of the IBM PC line since the company entered the business in 1981, include a PC based on the Intel Corp <INTC> 80386 microprocessor, making it the most powerful IBM PC to date.
